pages.cookies: Cookie Policy - Maharaja Palace Casino & Resort Home Our Apartments Restaurant Casino Home Our Apartments Restaurant Casino This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website. By continuing to use this site, you agree to the use of cookies as described in our Privacy Policy. Accept Privacy Policy What are cookies? Cookies are small text files that are stored on your computer by websites you visit. They are used by websites to remember things about your visit, such as the pages you have visited, your login details or the items in your shopping cart. Cookies are also used to track your browsing behaviour, for example, to see which pages you visit most often. We use cookies to improve your experience of our website. They help us to understand how you use the site, so we can make it better. What type of cookies do we use? There are two main types of cookies: session cookies and persistent cookies. Session cookies are temporary cookies that are deleted when you close your web browser. They are used to remember things about your visit, such as the pages you have visited. Persistent cookies are used to remember your preferences for longer, so they remain on your computer even after you close your browser. How do I manage cookies? You can manage cookies by adjusting your browser settings. If you disable cookies, you may not be able to use certain features of our website. You can also delete cookies that are already stored on your computer by going to your browserâ€™s settings. Please note that if you delete cookies, you may not be able to use some of the functions on our website. How do I disable cookies? To disable cookies, you can adjust your browser settings. Different browsers have different ways of managing cookies. In Google Chrome, you can disable cookies by going to Settings and then Privacy and security. In Mozilla Firefox, you can disable cookies by going to Options and then Privacy. Please note that if you disable cookies, you may not be able to use some of the functions on our website.
